text: [possessivesubject] arms are black and cracked as if charred by searing flames
[possessivesubject] legs twist backward and end in cloven hooves of a goat
[possessivesubject] chest is inscribed with runes of demonic power
[possessivesubject] head is twisted and contorted
horns protrude and curl backwards from [possessivesubject] forehead
[possessivesubject] mouth is filled with with a razor smile and forked tongue
[possessivesubject] lips are luscious yet black with veins like magma
[possessivesubject] tentacles twist and writhe, covered in razor barbs
[possessivesubject] tentacles twitch and weep with a black breath
[possessivesubject] chest is covered in intersected chitin
[possessivesubject] head is elongated and split
[possessivesubject] mouth is split in two fanged mandibles
[possessivesubject] antenna twitches in the air with near silent chitinous clicks
[possessivesubject] chest glows with the hum of eldritch sigils
[possessivesubject] hair stands up with power
[possessivesubject] eyes glow a solid white
[possessivesubject] horns twist and glow with veins of power
[possessivesubject] mouth is filled with rows of teeth
[possessivesubject] wings crackle with lightning
[possessivesubject] antenna twist and contort to unknown stimuli
[possessivesubject] tentacles twitch and weep with a black breath
[possessivesubject] chest is covered in tiny fibrous hairs
[possessivesubject] head is compact
[possessivesubject] legs are segmented in chitinous pieces
[possessivesubject] wings gleam with semi-opaque sheen
[possessivesubject] compound eyes are clustered and motled on their head
[possessivesubject] legs are blocky and chunky
[possessivesubject] arms are blocky and chunky
[possessivesubject] chest is covered in seals and ports
[possessivesubject] head is adorned with myriad sensors
one of [possessivesubject] arms has been amputated just past the shoulder, with a cute lil stump left
